summary: A mod that replaces Hjalti's Sword model and adds a craftable version, Hjaltbrand, after finishing the quest "The Ghost of Old Hroldan".
descriptionHtml:
[size=4]Credits to ClipsyMoon for the textures used in the grip part of the weapon, from the wonderful mod [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/78249]Iron Things[/url].
[/size]
[size=4]This mod needs the [b]Dragonborn[/b] DLC for its texture dependency.[/size]



[size=4]This mod replaces Hjalti's Sword model, wherein the overall appearance is dependent on your installed textures for Ancient Nord Sword, Stalhrim Greatsword and Iron Sword.


This also adds a craftable version called Hjaltbrand which uses its own textures after you finish the quest [color=aquamarine][b]The Ghost of Old Hroldan.

[/b][/color]
--------------------------------------------------------------------------

Stats for Hjaltbrand:

Attack = 13
Weight = 12
Value = 300


Materials needed for crafting:

Silver Ingot = 2
Steel Ingot = 1
Refined Moonstone = 1
Leather = 3


This requires [b]1 Silver Ingot[/b] for tempering/upgrading.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

[/size]My other weapon mods:
